entries.title: Initial Setup & Admin Portal
entries.description: Cloned repos, created test suite, built Shadcn admin portal, created slide-in login panel

entries.title: Login branding image connection
entries.description: Fixed LoginSheet to fetch branding image from API. Added live preview to admin branding settings.

entries.title: Where search field in customer directory
entries.description: Added Google Places API key, fixed SafeGooglePlacesAutocomplete, fixed getSettings to exclude branding data

entries.title: Provider portal link from customer portal
entries.description: Fixed 'I am a Provider' dropdown link to use correct provider portal URL via env var

entries.title: Missing sidebar menu items from Nova
entries.description: Added Permissions, Company Imports, Claim Requests, Customer Documents, Stripe Management, System Management with placeholder pages

entries.title: All list item detail links now work
entries.description: Created generic ResourceShow component and added show/:id routes for all 16 resources that were missing them. Previously clicking any item redirected to dashboard.

entries.title: Populated database with seed data
entries.description: Ran RolePermissionSeeder (3 roles, 36 permissions), DemoDataSeeder (18 services), NdisPromptSeeder (8 sections), BspPromptSeeder (10 sections), and manually seeded 3 AI models

entries.title: Generic edit routes for all resources
entries.description: Created ResourceEdit component with auto-generated form fields and added edit/:id routes for 15 resources

entries.title: Improved Services list and edit UI
entries.description: Services list now shows avatar thumbnails with initials/icons, active status badges, and provider count. Custom edit page with Switch toggle for active status and service name in title.

entries.title: Service image upload in edit page
entries.description: Added image upload/preview/remove to Services edit page with FormData submission. Updated backend ServiceController to handle image uploads to S3 and append service_image accessor. List page now shows real service images via Avatar.

entries.title: Provider Company Dashboard page
entries.description: Replaced basic show page with comprehensive dashboard: header with logo/badges/ABN, 4 stat cards, 5 tabs (Overview, Team & Logins, Services, Premises, Reviews with rating breakdown), and inline edit dialog with Shadcn Switch toggles. Created custom Dialog UI component.

entries.title: Services link in customer portal navigation
entries.description: Public routes (/services, /directory, /provider-profile) were unreachable because catch-all wildcard routes were defined before them in AppRoutingSetup. Moved PublicLayout routes above the catch-all.

entries.title: Google Places Autocomplete deprecation warning
entries.description: Replaced react-google-autocomplete (which uses deprecated google.maps.places.Autocomplete widget) in AUSuburbs component with custom implementation using AutocompleteService (not deprecated). Custom dropdown for place predictions, geocoding for coordinates. Package react-google-autocomplete is now unused.

entries.title: Redesigned Services wizard UI
entries.description: Complete redesign of the 4-step service request wizard: new StepIndicator with circular icons and animated connecting lines, centered max-w-2xl layout, card-based selection buttons for age/access method, two-column participant form, ProviderBadge pill component, improved navigation with ghost Back and primary Continue buttons with chevrons, Loader2 spinner for submit state.

entries.title: Converted Find Services to slide-out panel
entries.description: Replaced multi-step wizard with Shadcn Sheet slide-out panel. Services nav link now opens a right-side panel with Google Places location search, Shadcn Select for service type, live provider count badge, and Search button that navigates to /directory with results. Removed /services route and wizard pages.
